devdoc.details: Smart contract to handle token swap        interactions for PrimeDeals

checkExecutability(uint32).details: Checks whether a token swap action can be executed (which is the case if all DAOs have deposited)

params._dealId: The dealId of the action (position in the array)

returns._0: A bool flag indiciating whether the action can be executed

createSwap(address[],address[],uint256[].details: Create a new token swap action and automatically creates Dao Deposit Manager for each DAO that does not have one

params._daos: Array containing the DAOs that are involed in this action
params._deadline: Time until which this action can be executed (unix timestamp)
params._pathFrom: Two-dimensional array containing the tokens flowing from the DAOs into the module: - First array level is for each token - Second array level is for each dao - Contains absolute numbers of tokens
params._pathTo: Two-dimensional array containing the tokens flowing from the module to the DAOs: - First array level is for each token - Second array level is for each dao - Contains a tuple(4) consisting of instant amount, vested  amount, vesting start, vesting end which then makes this  array look like: [[instantAmount_dao1, vestedAmount_dao1, vestingStart_dao1, vestingEnd_dao1, instantAmount_dao2, ...], [...]]
params._tokens: Array containing the tokens that are involed in this action

params._dealId: The dealId of the action (position in the array)

params._feeWallet: Address of the new fee wallet

devdoc.title: PrimeDeals Token Swap Module

FeeChanged(uint32,uint32).notice: This event is emitted when the fee is updated

FeeWalletChanged(address,address).notice: This event is emitted when the fee wallet address is updated
